page.title: 05Trade
page.content: The biggest trading concern in Lochgelly is the Co-operative Society, founded in 1865; no longer an independent unit, but part of the larger Central Fife Co-op. Society Ltd.The Lochgelly Society employs 134 people. It occupies premises in Bank St., Main St., and High St. but trade recession has caused the closure of two shops in Main St. { SHOPS No.! SHOPS No.} { _____ ___! _____ ___} Bakers 3{!}Footwear 1 Butchers 4{!}Fruit & Veg. 3 Chemists 3{!}Jewellers 2 Clothes 3{!}Joiners 2 Dry Cleaner 1{!}Ironmongers 2 Electrical 1{!}Motors Spares 1 Fancy Goods 2{!}Newsagents 4 Fishmonger 1{!}Shoe Repairer 1 {
